definition: Burqin county or Burchin nahiyisi in Altay prefecture 阿勒泰地區|阿勒泰地区[A1 le4 tai4 di4 qu1], Xinjiang
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津

sentences.english: The breathtaking landscape is located in Burerjin County of Aletai area in Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 喀納斯湖位於新疆阿勒泰地區布爾津縣。
